comment: "Leher jaisi machalti hai, kinare se sambhalti hai, Lage shabnam ke katron si, phoolon pe tu chalti hai", this is you. Thanks for existing nd being my biggest supporter/believer during thick and thins & Indi Tandoori taste krwane kliye  . (also toxicity se bachana >> anything)❤️
name: Himanshu Gupta

comment:
Use jitna dekhu utna sochu kya use mai kehduu.....Heyy pretty women., the perfect person to dedicate this song to 
i have learnt a lot from you be it cooking or life lessons, thankyou for making me feel special always. 
Abhi to tujse cooking seekhni hai muje acche se😁 
Grateful to have you❤️
name: Monika

comment: Pranju baby, complete package h tu. 506🏠 wouldn't be the same without you. Always stay the same my sleeping beauty. Our late night cooking sessions were one of the best times in campus. Thank you for always being there for me and for all the valuable advices. I will miss you. love you pretty xoxo❤️
name: Ayushi Agrawal

comment: So I really thought about what to write. I mean even though we have known each other for just a year but there is so much to write. Our banters 🤐🤐, the trips we had 🐒🐒and so much more🫡🫡. Thanks for being a part of college life and for sure "noone" can forget you 🌚🌚.
name: Ayush

comment:
To my most favourite Di!!
You are one of the most nicest, humble and pure-hearted personI have ever met.I feel senior is a very small word, you guys are like a family to me! Will miss our 2am backchodi, aapka life gyan😂,watching sunrises!
Really di thankyou for everything!🥹🫶
Ps-Aapka ladla junior
name: Maitreya Pathak

comment: You care about everyone Pranju. You're mature & considerate. You make the best food & I am sooo gonna miss those 3am veg Maggi sessions with our gossip. You' re the most chill CSE peep I've met and my sleep partner(iykyk). Thank you for being a part of my life. Will miss you, love you, Pranju baby.
name: Kanishka Goyal

comment: The one who came in the same quarantine window as me. She's got a hidden talent to sleep indefinitely (Nobita). Cycle dekh ke chalaya kr. Kuch bhi ho, par Maggie or bhindi acchi banati hai. Will miss all those talks while roaming on campus. Lastly, thanks for the chocolate that one time ✌🏻.
name: Varun Kumar

comment:
Hehe
Pranjali Di
One of my favourite seniors, always helpful, kind and supportive, I wonder how you do it all, tolerating HG 4018, work and being awesome
Jokes apart
You’re the best creative head on campus and an even better human being
I sincerely wish you and your future kaam wali bai well.
Bye 🫶
name: Manya Jain

comment: Pranjali, my foodie friend! Remembering our fun trips, especially the  'bandar wala' incident in Vrindavan, always brings a smile. Your cooking, whether it's veg maggi or bhindi, is top-notch, just like your adorable scoldings. Thanks for being there through thick and thin.—I'm lucky to have you!❤️
name: Manisha

comment:
Miss those comments that u used to make on my WhatsApp DP + those discussion about series🧛🏻. The dumbest GADHI. Kadhi kadhi athvan aali tr Just Asach msg karat jaa.  
Yours :- Adi ****
name: Aditya

comment: TEDx se shuruwaat hui thi apni dosti ki.. Pranjali, to me you are a cheerful person with a beautiful voice.. someone who has been a part of so many memories now... I admire how you handled the design team and I would love to sit and chat about some books and gossip over a bonfire with you..
name: Dhairya Mistry

comment: Meeting you was a delightful surprise! Enjoyed working together at TEDx. Our creative vibes and the cool T-shirt we designed hold some of the sweetest college memories together! Great team leader and well-organized. Wishing you a happy and successful life ahead! 🚀 All the best for your future! 🌟
name: Jaydeep Umarya

comment: One of my few good friends in CSE. Kaafi sweet hai tu. Lab ki bakchodi mei kaafi mazza aata tha 😁.  Tere se motivation milta tha ki sirf mai hi nalla nhi hu CSE mei😆. Wish you the best for the future.
name: Jaskaran Singh

comment: Covid m evening n night walks best thi..vps bdmntn khelenge yaar kbhi😂kv p, bhle hi kitni bhi hawa chle. Cse m kch hi toh log h jo chill h padhai m😂carbon k labs yaad aa rhe isse. Hmesha mst carefree ghumti h tu, sona apna constant vibe match h. Mlte rhenge yaar jyda dur toh nhi h apn. ATB bro :-)
name: Anushka

comment: Always had a great time with you. Tapri varchya aplya churcha far miss karnar. Hey you have got a really nice smile. Nehami ashich  aanandi raha❤️
name: Sakshi

comment: I wish I could have spend more time with you !khup kahi bolacha hota, khup thikani firacha hota .In online sems,  You was my that friend to whom I used to talk about anything , and I remember when we talk while you were making pizza at home haha..those were the days !! Wish we recreate this in BLR🥰
name: Ujjwal Hendwe

comment: Sweetest, cutest and the only sensible person in our flat! I Had the best time with you in such a short span. I promise your cooking lessons will not go in vain. Tujhe mst khana bana k khilaungi jldi hi😂. I love you, Pranju and will miss you ❤
name: Monal Pawar

comment:
Online me tereko jo bully kiya h maine 😂😂.
Wo apni cinephiles ki movie jo kabhi release nhi hui yaad hi hogi usme itni bkc hui. Aur wo apni walk to kabhi ho nhi payi but anyways you're a really nice person.
Good luck for the future.
name: Arjun Singh

comment: Mastikhor, cheerful, always smiling, and one of the chill people of CSE, tere sath kiya hua group project hamesha yaad rahega bro, apan teeno ke teeno kamchor pata nahi kese milke pass hue the usme 😂😂 All the best for your future and milte rahiyo mast comedy baatein or jokes kiya karenge 😂
name: Sarvagya Kanungo

comment:
Aaj bhi Aur Vansh kya chal rha hai par blank ho jata hu 🤣 , Glamorous girl ✨, It was really fun playing games and roaming in campus  will miss those times.
All the best and stay in touch pretty please !

comment:
Sharing things with u in online to sticker fights😂
(Fir online hi jaa rahe h wese) Miss those online moments! All the best bro, jo tum chaho uss se jyada mile tumko. Bhul na jaana🙂 milte julte rehna

comment: We started talking from the beginning and did BTP together. We would always remember Amit and the way he guided us XD. Apart from that, it was really fun to be your project partner. We don’t talk much but do keep in touch, and enjoy your journey now onwards. All the best!
name: Nilay Patel

comment:
Personal photographer banake rkhne walo, janta maaf nhi karegi. Aaj tak maggie bana ke nhi khilaai hai jiski sab tareef krte hai . Hope so mil jaegi Soon. Festivals🥰 Ticket to ride & Tedx memories🥰 will stay forever. Stay connected and stay blessed. 
Note: I 'm always a call away 🥰❤🥰
name: Saurabh Yadav
